line.1.text: The sky is a big responsibility. And I am the lone intern. This explains

line.2.text: my drinking. This explains my luminous portage, my baboon heart

line.3.text: that breaks nightly like the news. Who

line.4.text: am I kidding? I am Diego Rodrguez Velzquez. I am a dry

line.5.text: and eviscerated analysis of the Russian Revolution.

line.6.text: I am line seven. And my memory, like a melon,

line.7.text: contains many dark seeds. Already, this poem has achieved

line.8.text: the status of lore amongst you little people of New England. Nevertheless,

line.9.text: I, Dr. Samuel Johnson, experience moments of such profound alienation

line.10.text: that I have surrendered my pistols to the care of my sister,

line.12.text: Forgive me. For I have taken things too far. And now your carpet is ruined.

line.13.text: Forgive me. For I am not who you think I am, I am Charlie Chaplin

line.14.text: playing a waiter embarrassed by his occupation. And when the rich woman

line.16.text: enters this bistro, I must pretend that Im only pretending to play a waiter
